fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation

Interface Evaluator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - samples data type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccuracyEvaluator, ApEvaluator, FScoreEvaluator, MulticlassAccuracyEvaluator, MultipleEvaluator, PrecisionEvaluator

    public interface Evaluator<T>
    Basic interface for all evaluation tools.
    Author:
    picard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evaluate()
      Run the training procedure and compute score.
      double getScore()
      Tells the score resulting of the evaluation
      void setClassifier(Classifier<T> cls)
      Sets the classifier to use for evaluation
      void setTestingSet(java.util.List<TrainingSample<T>> testlist)
      Sets the list of testing samples on which to evaluate the classifier

      Sets the list of training samples on which to train the classifier
